Translations.Text: num̆bagē paramādhipati æt sēnāva saman̆ga kaṭayutu kaḷē kesēdæ yi num̆ba nuduṭuvehida
ovungē kumantraṇaya muḷā kirīmehi pat nokaḷēda
tavada ohu ovun mata raṁcu vaśayen kurullan evvēya
un ovun mata pulussana lada mæṭi valin vū gal heḷuvēya
eviṭa ovun va kā damana lada piduru men ohu pat kaḷēya
